body_html: Let me try to conjure @shibatch, just in case this is something that isn't supported on his end. I'm blindly assuming this is independent of how we build SLEEF since it works on all other architectures and you're using the same build tools. More likely than not, we'll simply have to guard this as well and compile the code without SLEEF on ppc64le. It won't be useful over there anyway, since AVX/AVX2 doesn't exist on ppc64le and we only use it in that context via vec256.

body: Let me try to conjure @shibatch, just in case this is something that isn't supported on his end. I'm blindly assuming this is independent of how we build SLEEF since it works on all other architectures and you're using the same build tools. More likely than not, we'll simply have to guard this as well and compile the code without SLEEF on ppc64le. It won't be useful over there anyway, since AVX/AVX2 doesn't exist on ppc64le and we only use it in that context via vec256.
